powers.name: Super Strength
powers.description: Exhibit extraordinary physical strength, allowing you to lift massive objects and deal enhanced melee damage.

effects.utility: Lift up to 5 tons, destroy large obstacles, or perform extraordinary feats of strength (GM discretion).

Greater Might.effect: Increase unarmed strike damage to +2d8 and your lifting capacity to 20 tons.

Ground Slam.effect: Create a 15-foot radius shockwave. Creatures must make a Dexterity save (DC = 10 + Strength modifier) or take 2d6 damage and be knocked prone.

Throw Anything.effect: Throw a heavy object up to 30 feet as a ranged attack, dealing 2d10 damage. The object lands in a 10-foot radius, potentially affecting multiple targets.

powers.name: Energy Blasts
powers.description: Fire a blast of energy at a target within 60 feet, choosing between fire, lightning, force, or radiant damage.

effects.action: Make a ranged energy attack to deal 2d6 damage (damage type chosen upon selection).

Wide Burst.effect: Fire a 15-foot cone, forcing creatures to make a Dexterity save (DC = 10 + proficiency bonus + relevant modifier) or take 2d6 damage (half on success).

Overcharge.effect: Deal 3d10 damage to a single target but take 1d6 recoil damage.

Piercing Beam.effect: Your blasts ignore resistance to their damage type and deal half damage to creatures immune to it.

Explosive Impact.effect: Hit a target and create a 10-foot radius explosion. The target takes full damage, and creatures in the area take 1d6 splash damage.

powers.name: Teleportation
powers.description: Instantly teleport up to 60 feet to a location you can see.

Combat Blink.effect: Teleport 10 feet as a reaction to avoid an attack after knowing the attack roll but before damage is dealt.

Long Range.effect: Teleport up to 500 feet to a location you can see or visualize.

Mass Teleport.effect: Teleport yourself and up to 5 creatures within 30 feet to a location within 120 feet. Unwilling creatures must make a Wisdom save to resist.

Phantom Step.effect: After teleporting, gain advantage on your next attack or impose disadvantage on an enemyâ€™s next attack.

powers.name: Healing Factor
powers.description: Regenerate health passively and resist damage.

effects.passive: Regain 2 HP at the start of your turn if you are not at 0 HP. Automatically stabilize when reduced to 0 HP.

Rapid Recovery.effect: Regain 2d6 HP as a bonus action once per short rest.

Resilient Body.effect: Gain Advantage on saving throws against poison, disease, and exhaustion. All adverse condition durations are reduced by half.

Emergency Healing.effect: When reduced to 0 HP, regain 15 HP instantly. Usable once per long rest. However, the massive healing leaves you briefly incapacitated, ending your turn immediately.

Regeneration.effect: Regain 1d6 + Constitution Modifier HP at the start of each turn instead of 2 HP.

powers.name: Super Speed
powers.description: Increase movement speed drastically, enhancing combat effectiveness.

effects.bonus_action: Increase your movement speed by 30 feet for 1 minute. You also gain advantage on Dexterity saving throws while this is active.

Blur.effect: While moving more than 30 feet in a turn, impose disadvantage on attack rolls against you.

Quick Strike.effect: Perform an additional melee or ranged attack during your turn.

Afterimage.effect: Create an illusory duplicate by moving at high speed, as a reaction. An attacker must succeed on a Wisdom save (DC = 10 + Dex modifier) or miss entirely.

Supersonic Dash.effect: Dash 120 feet in a straight line, forcing all creatures in your path to make a Dexterity saving throw or take 3d6 damage and fall prone.
